content.p: Times.my - Internship Programme Description: We publish newspaper supplements for Malaysia's largest English daily, The Star. Our supplement topics cover early childhood education, higher education, CSR, motoring technology and many more. Our online presence is represented by four websites that cover the whole education spectrum - primary to postgraduate studies. Our magazines are targeted at SPM students and school leavers - SPM Revision Guide and Top Careers. We run online education platforms - SchoolAdvisory.my and Postgraduate.my. We need interns for a few departments. We're always on the lookout for fresh, enthusiastic young talents who can share with us new ideas and perspectives. How to apply: Please send your CV along with a brief cover letter that describes your interest in the position to HR manager June at june@times.my with a CC to anushia@times.my. Please write “Times.my Internship” in the subject line of your e-mail. This internship is open to Malaysians and non-Malaysians. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
